revised_title: Descriptive Baire Sets in Completely Regular Spaces
tldr: This article develops a theory of descriptive Baire sets for an arbitrary completely regular space. It shows that descriptive Baire sets are Baire sets and form a system closed under countable union, countable intersection, and intersection with a Baire set. The article also explores the relationship between descriptive Baire sets, Borel sets, and descriptive Borel sets, and provides conditions for these classes to coincide.
